Articles.Content: i found a bug where if you place a kerbal in a fairing the game crashes ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Moved, provisionally, to the stock support forum. Please read the [thread=92230]Stock Support and Bug Reporting Guide[/thread]. In particular, more precise reproduction steps would help.
